title: Italian Christmas pudding cake
description: There seem to be many steps here. This conceals the fact that it is ludicrously, dazzlingly easy to make: it doesn’t require cooking or technical brilliance: it is merely an assembly job. Not that you need to be advertising this fact to appreciative eaters.
ingredients: 6 tbsp Tuaca liqueur (or rum, brandy or Marsala)
250ml/9fl oz double cream, at room temperature
125g/4½oz mini chocolate chips or finely chopped chocolate
